lectures.Title: Course Logistics
lectures.Comment: Cooper Miller and Arul Verma discuss course logistics, grading, and course content in this lesson. No homeworks/MPs yet, so no due dates coming up. Have a great beginning of your semester, I-L-L!

lectures.Title: Rust Setup
lectures.Comment: What is Rust, how to install it, and how to create a simple program.

lectures.Title: Rust Basics
lectures.Comment: Rust basics, including variables, types, and mutability.

lectures.Title: Pattern Matching in Rust
lectures.Comment: Strings and match statements in Rust.

lectures.Title: Ownership and Borrowing
lectures.Comment: Basics of memory management and ownership in Rust.

lectures.Title: Enums & Option/Result + Borrowing & Dereferencing
lectures.Comment: Enums, Option/Result, and more ownership in Rust.
